Dan Shaughnessy

Cody Ross a leading man

Ross hit a pair of three-run homers against the first-place White Sox Wednesday, and won Thursday night’s game with a walkoff, three-run blast.

Harvard study placed elderly at risk

Federally ordered letters will inform more than 1,300 nursing home residents of risks they were exposed to in a Harvard-led study.

the classics a modern spin

The audience is transported into the middle of a multimedia mash-up of familiar numbers from the world of opera and ballet.

John Kerry hopes to cap his career with a stint as secretary of state in a second Obama term.

Venture investing rises,
but still off 2011 pace

New England companies received $843 million in investments from venture capital firms during the three months that ended June 30. That’s up nearly 13 percent from the first quarter.
Opinion | Steven Syre

A word of caution on
Massachusetts health cost reform

No health cost law is going to be perfect. The issues are big and complicated — almost certainly beyond the grasp of any single piece of legislation.
